creator: Egemen Can Uze
descriptionHtml:
Learn 3500 Italian nouns, adjectives, articles and verbs to enrich your vocabulary. Memorise most common Italian words. Listen pronunciation of the words. Learn with word games, phrases and word lists. Best flash card app to learn Italian most common vocabulary and words!

Build a daily habit of learning 5 words a day to see long term progress.

- Flip the flashcards to find out the meaning of the Italian words.
- Swipe right if you learned the word.
- Swipe left if you want the card to be shown again in the future.

Features:
- Listen pronunciation of the Italian words, verbs, phrases, articles and adjectives.
- Track your progress in each level.
- Images provided in the back of the card to help you remember the words naturally. New images are being added.
- Review learned words.
- Play word games to practice in an entertaining way.
- Earn points by learning and practising. Then unlock phrases and word lists.
- Favourite words and stats.
- Common words for all levels: A1,A2,B1,B2,C1,C2

Unlock Phrasebook and word lists for the following topics:
Airport
Animals
Business
Clothes
Colours
Countries
Daily conversations
Days and Months
Doctor
Emergency
Family
Flirting
Food
Hobbies
Hotel
House and Furniture
Human Body
Kitchen Equipments
Language
Numbers
Occupations
Restaurant
Shopping
Sports
Time
Travel
Weather
descriptionShort: Learn Italian language, memorise, listen articles, words & verbs with flashcards

appDetails.developerAddress: Muammer Akar Mah. 46/21 Sok. No: 59-65 Karabaglar/Izmir
appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- Word game
- Practice and review vocabulary by their difficulty.
- Introducing Practices & Games. Now you can practice the words you learned.
- Introducing Phrases and word lists. Earn points by learning and practicing. Then unlock phrases and word lists.
- Now you can keep track of your vocabulary, favorite words and stats.
- Bug fixes

Learn 3500 Italian nouns, adjectives, articles and verbs to enrich your vocabulary. Memorise most common Italian words. Listen pronunciation of the words. Learn with word games, phrases and word lists. Best flash card app to learn Italian most common vocabulary and words!

Build a daily habit of learning 5 words a day to see long term progress.

- Flip the flashcards to find out the meaning of the Italian words.
- Swipe right if you learned the word.
- Swipe left if you want the card to be shown again in the future.

Features:
- Listen pronunciation of the Italian words, verbs, phrases, articles and adjectives.
- Track your progress in each level.
- Images provided in the back of the card to help you remember the words naturally. New images are being added.
- Review learned words.
- Play word games to practice in an entertaining way.
- Earn points by learning and practising. Then unlock phrases and word lists.
- Favourite words and stats.
- Common words for all levels: A1,A2,B1,B2,C1,C2
descriptionShort: Learn Italian language, memorise, listen articles, words & verbs with flashcards

appDetails.developerAddress: Muammer Akar Mah. 46/21 Sok. No: 59-65 Karabaglar/Izmir
appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- Word game
- Practice and review vocabulary by their difficulty.
- Introducing Practices & Games. Now you can practice the words you learned.
- Introducing Phrases and word lists. Earn points by learning and practicing. Then unlock phrases and word lists.
- Now you can keep track of your vocabulary, favorite words and stats.
- Premium features: Sync your progress & unlimited hints for games
- Bug fixes

title:
Tobo: Learn Italian Vocabulary
2.9.3

container.value: Turgutreis Mah. 313 Sok. No:12 D:3 35280 Konak/Izmir

creator: Tobo Languages
descriptionHtml:
Learn Italian with games and flashcards. Memorise the most common words in the Italian language along with their articles. Master frequently used core vocabulary and listen to their pronunciation. You'll find multiple sections in the app that suit your learning style, such as common phrases, engaging Italian language games, vocabulary exercises, and more.

Build a daily habit of learning 5 words a day to see long-term results.

Flip the flashcards to find out the meaning of the Italian words.
Swipe right if you learnt the word.
Swipe left if you want the card to be shown again in the future.

Features:
Listen to the pronunciation of Italian words, verbs, phrases, articles, and adjectives.
Track your progress in each level.
Images on the back of the card will help you learn naturally.
Organise your vocabulary by difficulty. Review with spaced repetition.
Play word games to practise in an entertaining way.
Earn points by learning and practising. Then unlock phrases and word lists.
Add items to favourites and view your stats.
Learn vocabulary by level: A1, A2, B1, B2, C1, C2.
Phrasebook for daily conversations.
Practise vocabulary by playing.
Learn Italian at your own pace.
Memorise articles.

Premium Features:
Sync your progress
Unlimited hints for games
Remove ads
Unlock hidden content

No matter your starting level, Tobo will offer you words in levels to help you learn Italian from day one.
descriptionShort: Study the most common words and phrases with Tobo Italian language learning app!

appDetails.developerAddress: Turgutreis Mah. 313 Sok. No:12 D:3 35280 Konak/Izmir
appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- Challenge in Tournament
- Custom Practice mode
- Daily Challenge
- Create your own lists
- Bug fixes
